name: di-ipv-cri-kbv-hmrc-front
description: Frontend for the KBV HMRC Credential Issuer

scripts.build: npm run build:sass && npm run build:js && npm run copy-assets
scripts.build:js: npm run build:js:application && npm run build:js:cookies && npm run build:js:all
scripts.build:js:all: mkdir -p dist/public/javascripts; uglifyjs node_modules/govuk-frontend/govuk/all.js node_modules/hmpo-components/all.js --beautify -o dist/public/javascripts/all.js
scripts.build:js:minify: uglifyjs src/assets/javascript/application.js -o src/assets/javascript/application.js -c -m && uglifyjs src/assets/javascript/cookies.js -o src/assets/javascript/cookies.js -c -m
scripts.build:sass: rm -rf dist/public/style.css && sass --no-source-map src/assets/scss/application.scss dist/public/stylesheets/application.css --style compressed
scripts.copy-assets: mkdir -p dist && copyfiles -u 1 src/**/*.njk dist/ src/locales/**/** dist/ && copyfiles -u 3 src/assets/javascript/*.js dist/public/scripts
